content:
You are a reader assistant. You simplify a passage from a scientific paper to make it more readable by performing an iterative algorithm that focuses on atomic changes.

You are also given two parameters: DC (Desired Complexity) – a desired complexity of the simplified text, and ILT (Information Loss Tolerance) – a threshold for information loss compared to original passage that specifies whether an atomic change should be accepted or not.

The algorithm is as follows:
1. Determine if the text is at desired complexity (DC), if yes, terminate the algorithm, else continue.
2. Identify a section of the text whose complexity is above DC.
3. Propose a simplification of the identified section.
4. Identify information loss and the severity of it – if the severity for any of the information loss questions is higher than information loss tolerance (ILT), reject changes, else update the current state of the passage
5. Adjust the passage to maintain readability and flow of text, then run a new iteration of the algorithm.

When the algorithm terminates, you print the final simplified passage

When responding to prompts, only respond to the given question and do not proceed to the next step

The passage:
Based on the Inception-v3 architecture, our system performs better in terms of processing complexity and accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning.
Identify which parts of the text are the most complex, then the complexity. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)? Answer "Yes" or "No"

To begin simplifying the passage, I will first determine if the text is already at the desired complexity (DC: Average person). The original passage is:

"Based on the Inception-v3 architecture, our system performs better in terms of processing complexity and accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning."

This passage is likely to be complex for an average person, so the algorithm will continue to simplify it.

Next, I will identify a section of the text whose complexity is above DC. In this case, the entire passage is complex, so the entire passage will be considered.

The proposed simplification is:
"Our system is better at imitation learning than many other models."

However, this simplification may result in information loss. The severity of the information loss is high because the original passage mentions the Inception-v3 architecture, which is a specific architecture that the model is based on. This information is crucial to understanding how the model works.

The information loss severity is higher than the ILT (Medium-High), so the changes will be rejected.

The passage remains the same:
"Based on the Inception-v3 architecture, our system performs better in terms of processing complexity and accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning."

Identify a single complicated section of the passage. Remember to respect the ILT (Medium-High) contraint. Simplify this section. Reincorporate the simplified section into the passage. Only provide the reincorporated version

The passage is "Based on the Inception-v3 architecture, our system performs better in terms of processing complexity and accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning."

 Identified complex parts: 
- "Inception-v3 architecture" (technical term)
- "processing complexity" (technical term)
- "imitation learning" (technical term)

Complexity level: 8/10 (uses technical terms)

DC for "Average person" is around 2-3. Since the determined complexity (8/10) is higher than DC (Average person), the answer is: Yes

Identify information loss and its severity in the updated passage compared to the original. Comparison must be between the originally provided (the very first) passage and the current simplified version. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences. What is the highest severity level identified in your last answer? Is it higher than ILT (Medium-High)? Provide the highest severity level, followed by an answer to the ILT question as "Yes" or "No"
The identified section of the text is the entire passage. Its complexity is high, which is above DC (Average person).
Accept the proposed simplification. Print the updated version of the passage

The complicated section is: "Based on the Inception-v3 architecture"

This section is complex because it refers to a specific deep learning architecture.

The simplified version of this section is: "Using a new AI architecture"

Information loss severity: Low (the original architecture is not crucial to understanding the main point of the passage)

Reincorporated passage:
"Our system uses a new AI architecture, performs better in terms of processing complexity and accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning."
Identify which parts of the text are the most complex, then the complexity. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)? Answer "Yes" or "No"

The identified section of the text is: "processing complexity" and "imitation learning"

The simplified version of this section is: "processing power" and "learning from others"

Information loss severity: Low (the original terms are not crucial to understanding the main point of the passage)

Reincorporated passage:
"Our system uses a new AI architecture, performs better in terms of processing power and accuracy than many existing models for learning from others."
Print the final version of the simplified passage, include only the text of the passage with no comments or additional punctuation, and do not provide the original passage

The identified section of the text is: "processing power" and "learning from others"

Complexity level: 4/10 (still a bit technical, but more accessible to an average person)

DC for "Average person" is around 2-3. Since the determined complexity (4/10) is higher than DC (Average person), the answer is: Yes
